flagsdescription.title: 998.specrand Flags
flagsdescription.header: There are a few preprocessor macros used in 998.specrand. Because they control the workings of the PRNG, attempting to change them is not allowed.
flagsdescription.flag: Attempting to undefine _A_MULTIPLIER is forbidden. It would break the code anyway.
Attempting to undefine _M_MODULUS is forbidden. It would break the code anyway.
Attempting to undefine _Q_QUOTIENT is forbidden. It would break the code anyway.
Attempting to undefine _R_REMAINDER is forbidden. It would break the code anyway.
